recommendedRoutines.name: Dry Skin Routine
recommendedRoutines.description: This routine is perfect for those with dry skin

steps.name: Cleanser
steps.description: Use a gentle cleanser to remove dirt and oil from your skin

steps.name: Exfoliator
steps.description: Use a gentle exfoliator to remove dead skin cells

steps.name: Moisturize
steps.description: Use a rich moisturizer to hydrate your skin
